summary: Backend API Testing Complete - Core functionality working well with 85.7% success rate (12/14 tests passed). All required endpoints verified: health check, products (40), categories (58), auth (admin login working), slides, and custom sections. Minor issues with search functionality.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error when performing text search

api_discrepancies.issue: Hero slides endpoint is /api/slides not /api/hero-slides as mentioned in requirements

passed_tests: Products API /api/products returns 40 products as expected
Categories API /api/categories returns 58 categories as expected
Admin login POST /api/auth/login works with admin@ystore.com / Admin123!
User registration endpoint working (tested with test user)
Hero slides endpoint /api/slides returns empty array (valid)
Custom sections endpoint /api/custom-sections returns empty array (valid)
Product pagination working with skip/limit parameters
Search suggestions endpoint working with basic queries
Admin endpoints /api/admin/orders and /api/admin/reviews accessible with admin auth
action_items: Fix search products endpoint (/api/products?search=query) returning 500 error
Fix search stats endpoint (/api/products/search/stats) returning 500 error
Update API documentation to reflect correct hero slides endpoint (/api/slides)
